TypeSignature.Value: .class public sequential ansi sealed beforefieldinit FieldBuilder extends System.Reflection.FieldInfo implements class System.Runtime.InteropServices._FieldBuilder
Public NotInheritable Class FieldBuilder Inherits FieldInfo Implements _FieldBuilder
public ref class FieldBuilder sealed : System::Reflection::FieldInfo, System::Runtime::InteropServices::_FieldBuilder
type FieldBuilder = class inherit FieldInfo interface _FieldBuilder

Docs.summary: Defines and represents a field. This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format:
## Remarks 获取的实例`FieldBuilder`通过调用<xref:System.Reflection.Emit.TypeBuilder.DefineField%2A>， <xref:System.Reflection.Emit.ModuleBuilder.DefineInitializedData%2A>，或<xref:System.Reflection.Emit.ModuleBuilder.DefineUninitializedData%2A>。
> [!NOTE] > <xref:System.Reflection.Emit.FieldBuilder.SetValue%2A>目前不支持方法。 作为一种解决方法，检索<xref:System.Reflection.FieldInfo>通过专用于反映将已完成的类型和调用<xref:System.Reflection.FieldInfo.SetValue%2A>设置字段的值。

Public Overrides Function GetValue (obj As Object) As Object

Docs.param: The object on which to access the field.
Docs.summary: Retrieves the value of the field supported by the given object.
Docs.returns: An containing the value of the field reflected by this instance.

remarks.format:
## Remarks 如果此字段为`static`，则`obj`参数将被忽略。 对于非静态字段，`obj`应是继承或声明该字段的类的实例。
返回类型<xref:System.Reflection.Emit.FieldBuilder.GetValue%2A>是<xref:System.Object>。 例如，如果该字段将持有一个布尔值基元值，实例<xref:System.Object>值将返回带有适当的布尔值。 返回值之前<xref:System.Reflection.Emit.FieldBuilder.GetValue%2A>检查以确定用户是否具有访问权限。
对于完全受信任的代码将忽略访问限制。 `Private` 构造函数、 方法、 字段和属性可以访问并完全受信任代码时使用反射来调用。

Docs.exception: This method is not supported.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void SetConstant(object defaultValue) cil managed

Docs.param: The new default value for this field.
Docs.summary: Sets the default value of this field.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `defaultValue` 仅限于以下类型： `Boolean`， `SByte`， `Int16`， `Int32`， `Int64`， `Byte`， `UInt16`， `UInt32`， `UInt64`， `Single`， `Double`， `DateTime``Char`， `String`，和`Enum`。 如果字段类型是引用类型，需要 CLS 符合性`defaultValue`为`null`。 但是，从开始[!INCLUDE[net_v40_long](~/includes/net-v40-long-md.md)]，`defaultValue`可以为非 null 的类型，只要可以将值分配给该引用类型的引用。 例如，`Int32`值可以分配给类型的字段<xref:System.Object>。 这不符合 CLS，但可能会在互操作方案中有用。

Docs.exception: The containing type has been created using .

The field is not one of the supported types. -or- The type of does not match the type of the field. -or- The field is of type or other reference type, is not , and the value cannot be assigned to the reference type.

MemberSignature.Value: public override void SetValue (object obj, object val, System.Reflection.BindingFlags invokeAttr, System.Reflection.Binder binder, System.Globalization.CultureInfo culture);

.method public hidebysig virtual instance void SetValue(object obj, object val, valuetype System.Reflection.BindingFlags invokeAttr, class System.Reflection.Binder binder, class System.Globalization.CultureInfo culture) cil managed

public: override void SetValue(System::Object ^ obj, System::Object ^ val, System::Reflection::BindingFlags invokeAttr, System::Reflection::Binder ^ binder, System::Globalization::CultureInfo ^ culture);
override this.SetValue : obj * obj * System.Reflection.BindingFlags * System.Reflection.Binder * System.Globalization.CultureInfo -> unit

Docs.param: The object on which to access the field.
The value to assign to the field.
A member of that specifies the type of binding that is desired (for example, IBinder.CreateInstance, IBinder.ExactBinding).
A set of properties and enabling for binding, coercion of argument types, and invocation of members using reflection. If binder is null, then IBinder.DefaultBinding is used.
The software preferences of a particular culture.
Docs.summary: Sets the value of the field supported by the given object.

remarks.format:
## Remarks 此方法会将分配`val`反射了由此实例的字段的参数<xref:System.Object> `obj`。 如果该字段是静态的`obj`将被忽略。 对于非静态字段，`obj`应是继承或声明该字段的类的实例。
新值将作为传递<xref:System.Object>。 例如，如果字段的类型为布尔值的实例<xref:System.Object>值传递与相应的布尔值。 设置值前<xref:System.Reflection.Emit.FieldBuilder.SetValue%2A>检查以确定用户是否具有访问权限。
对于完全受信任的代码将忽略访问限制。 `Private` 构造函数、 方法、 字段和属性可以访问并完全受信任代码时使用反射来调用。
> [!NOTE] > 当前不支持该方法。 作为一种解决方法，检索<xref:System.Reflection.FieldInfo>通过专用于反映将已完成的类型和调用<xref:System.Reflection.FieldInfo.SetValue%2A>设置字段的值。

Docs.exception: This method is not supported.
